content: When you consider a rating, you also use your discernment. When you decide whether to watch a movie or not, you need information about the movie to make use of your tastes and discernment in the decisional process. The most relevant information comes from reviews, trailers, ratings, and plots. I really can’t tell from your answer what kind of information about a movie you’re thinking to assess through your tastes and discernment. I hope you don’t mind for telling you that, but your answer is vague. To me, it resembles more an intimate thought of someone than an actual response to an article.
